title: DLSA Muzaffarpur Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for 48 Para Legal Volunteers Posts
description: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA Muzaffarpur) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 48 Para Legal Volunteers Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the DLSA Muzaffarpur Recruitment 2026 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date of...
